mapper.select: select mbm.* from manager_belong_map mbm start with child_id = (select amp.id from manager_belong_map t left join account_manager_parameter amp on amp.id = t.child_id left join sys_user su ON su.id = amp.user_id where amp.user_id = #{id} ) connect by prior child_id = parent_id
SELECT T.*, s.DISPLAY_NAME FROM ACCOUNT_MANAGER_PARAMETER T LEFT JOIN SYS_USER s ON s.id = T.USER_ID WHERE s.USER_TYPE = '1' and t.id in ${childIdInStr} ORDER BY t.CREATED_TIME DESC
